author: Exioloz, PC_volt
description:
Yukari's combos

Combos taken from PC_Volt's BnB video.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=utSUriM0q3Y
name: Basic Combos

scenarios.description:
5AAAA j.x j.5A j.6A j.2B/j.5B |
Midscreen to corner, against everyone.
j.7>...>j.5B (almost universal)
j.7>...>j.2B (Cirno, Komachi, Reisen)
j.9>...>j.2C (universal).
scenarios.name: Dial A Midscreen to Corner

scenarios.description:
5AAAA j.x/hj.x j.5A j.6A j.5C |
Midscreen to corner, against everyone.
Do jump + j.5B from near corner.
From Midscreen, highjump is needed.
j.5A can be skipped.
scenarios.name: Dial A Midscreen to Corner

scenarios.description:
6A 5C hjc.x j.5C |
Midscreen to corner, against everyone.
This combo can be started with (CH)f5A.
scenarios.name: 6A Midscreen to Near Corner

scenarios.description:
(CH)6A 5C(whiff) d236C |
Midscreen to corner, against everyone.
5C whiff allow you to confirm your combo.
scenarios.name: 6A CH Midscreen

scenarios.description:
(CH)66C 5C hjc.x j.5C |
Near corner and farther, against everyone.
scenarios.name: 66C CH Midscreen to Near Corner

scenarios.description:
3A 2C hjc.9 j.5A j.8A |
Anywhere, against everyone.
Works when 3A hits close or at mid range.
scenarios.name: 3A 2C Anywhere

scenarios.description:
3A 2C(whiff) hjc.9 j.6A j.5C |
Anywhere, against everyone.
Variation for when 3A hits far.
scenarios.name: 3A 2C Anywhere

scenarios.description:
(CH)3A 2C(whiff) d236B/C |
Anywhere but Corner, against everyone.
2C whiff allow you to confirm your combo.
2C automatically times d236.
scenarios.name: 3A CH Anywhere but Corner

scenarios.description:
(CH)f5A 3A d236B |
Anywhere but Corner, against everyone.
(CH)f5A makes 2C whiff after 3A.
scenarios.name: f5A CH Anywhere but Corner

scenarios.description:
j.5A j.8A j.d236B |
Anywhere but Corner, against everyone.
Most basic air combo.
scenarios.name: j.5A Anywhere but Corner

scenarios.description:
j.5A j.6A j.5C j44 j.5C |
Start of advanced air combos.
A lot of variations branch from j.5A
for specific characters and spacing.
scenarios.name: j.5A Midscreen to Corner

scenarios.description:
5AAA 5B 2C hjc.x 5B j.D6 j.5A 5AAAA |
Won't work on all characters.
Also works in the corner.
Don't hj9 standing Utsuho and crouching Suwako
as j5B will limit early.
The combo becomes hard in corner.
j.5B can be skipped if you lack the orbs.
scenarios.name: 5AAA Anywhere
